name: GCH Craftsman Bar
location: Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa, Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa

items.title: Brioche French Toast
items.description: Thick-sliced Brioche with Vanilla-sweetened Mascarpone, Fresh Berries, Powdered Sugar, and Blueberry Compote, served with Seasonal Fruit

items.title: Lobster Benedict
items.description: Croissant, Canadian Bacon, Two Poached Eggs, Lobster, Hollandaise Caviar, Chives, House Salad

items.title: American Breakfast*
items.description: Scrambled Eggs, Bacon or Sausage, Seasonal Fruit or Breakfast Potatoes and choice of Toast: Wheat, White or Sourdough

items.title: Farmers Market Frittata*
items.description: Eggs, Ham, Spinach, House Blend Cheese, Onions, Asparagus, Bell Peppers, Roasted Vine Tomato, Lemon Hollandaise, House Salad

items.title: Fruit Plate
items.description: Sliced Fruit, Local Citrus, Seasonal Berries, Lowfat Cottage Cheese

items.title: Smoked Salmon Bagel Sandwich
items.description: Caper Cream Cheese, Arugula, Tomato and Red Onions, Toasted Plain Bagel, served with Seasonal Fruit

items.title: Avocado Toast on Sourdough
items.description: Grilled Sourdough, Avocado, Poached Eggs, Ricotta, Chives, Crispy Garlic, Honey, Basil and Lemon Oil

items.title: Oatmeal
items.description: Old Fashioned Rolled Oats, Local Berries and Blackstrap Molasses Drizzle

items.title: Breakfast Sandwich
items.description: Croissant Bun, Scrambled Eggs, Bacon, Cheddar, Smoked Paprika Aïoli, Avocado, Waffled Hash Brown, House Salad

items.title: Belgian Waffle of the Month
items.description: Please See Server for Details

items.title: Breakfast Burrito*
items.description: Eggs, Bacon, Potatoes, Pico de Gallo, Cheese, Flour Tortilla, Salsa Roja, Sour Cream, served with Seasonal Fruit

items.title: Power Pack
items.description: A Cuties® Mandarin Orange, Yogurt Smoothie, Carrots, Whole-Grain “Fish” Crackers, with Choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Kids' American Breakfast*
items.description: Scrambled Eggs, Turkey Bacon and Waffled Hash Browns, with Choice of Seasonal Fruit or Lowfat Yogurt and small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk

items.title: Kids' Mickey Waffle
items.description: Dusted with Powdered Sugar and Served with Syrup, with Choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk

items.title: Strawberry-Basil Smash
items.description: Strawberry, Basil, Lime, Sparkling Water, garnished with Strawberry Fan and Basil Leaf

items.title: Grapefruit Fizz
items.description: Grapefruit Juice, Sparkling Water, Simple Syrup, Orange Juice, garnished with half Grapefruit Wheel and Thyme Sprig

items.title: Crafted Bloody Mary
items.description: Bloody Mary Mix with Celery, Olives, Limes

items.title: Crafted Bloody Maria
items.description: Bloody Mary Mix with Celery, Olives, Limes

items.title: Avissi Prosecco Mimosa
items.description: with choice of Tangerine, Mango or Raspberry Juice

items.title: La Marca Luminore Prosecco Mimosa
items.description: with choice of Tangerine, Mango or Raspberry Juice

items.title: Schramsberg Blanc de Blancs Mimosa
items.description: with choice of Tangerine, Mango or Raspberry Juice

items.title: Café Especial
items.description: Dark Roasted Coffee, Herradura Blanco Tequila, Kahlúa, Cream, Whipped Cream

items.title: Grand Candied Orange Coffee
items.description: Dark Roasted Coffee, Grand Marnier, Brandy, Kahlúa, Cream, Whipped Cream, Orange Twist

items.title: Salmon Salad*
items.description: Salmon Filet, Cucumber, Avocado, Tomato, Sweet Peppers, Farro, Charred Green Onions, Shallots, Valbreso Feta, Champagne Vinaigrette, Arugula

items.title: Flat Iron Steak Salad*
items.description: Kale and Romaine, Avocado, Corn, Jicama, Cherry Tomatoes, Cilantro, Crispy Tortilla Strips, Toasted Pepitas and Queso Fresco with Greek Yogurt Caesar Dressing

items.title: Avocado Panzanella
items.description: Avocado, Sourdough Bread, Baby Heirloom Tomatoes, Mediterranean Olives, Feta, Arugula and Charred Onion Chimichurri

items.title: Sticky Chicken Wings
items.description: White Rice, Gochujang BBQ sauce, Pickled Cucumber Slaw, Toasted Sesame Seeds, Green Onions, Aleppo Spice

items.title: Baked Nachos
items.description: Choice of Shredded Beef or Chicken, Tortilla Chips, Cheese Sauce, Shredded Cheese, Black Beans, Green Onions, Pickled Jalapeños, Cilantro, Queso Fresco, Avocado, Crema and Salsa Roja

items.title: Lobster Mac & Cheese
items.description: Fresh Elbow Pasta, Cold Water Lobster Tail, Cheddar Cheese Sauce, Sourdough Gremolata

items.title: Poke Bowl*
items.description: Tossed in Citrus Ponzu with Cucumber, Edamame, Avocado, Crab Salad, Green Onions, Radicchio, Pickled Seaweed, Furikake and Spicy Aïoli, choice of Sushi Grade Ahi Tuna or Salmon and Calrose Rice or Mixed Greens

items.title: Hot Dog of the Month
items.description: Please Inquire with Server

items.title: Carne Asada Quesadilla
items.description: Grilled Carne Asada with Melted Cheese, Roasted Corn Relish, Black Beans and Green Onions, wrapped in a Flour Tortilla with Chipotle Crema, Fresno Chile, Cilantro and Limes

items.title: Angus Burger*
items.description: Cilantro-Mint Aïoli, White Onion, Smoked White Cheddar, Iceberg Lettuce, Pickles and Tomato on a Brioche Bun, served with Fries

items.title: Shrimp Ceviche
items.description: Marinated Shrimp, Spicy Citrus Broth, White Onion, Tomato, Cucumber, Avocado and Cilantro, served with Tortilla Chips

items.title: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Fresh Mozzarella, Fresh Basil, Fire-roasted Tomatoes, Artisan Cheese Blend

items.title: Classic Pepperoni Pizza
items.description: Premium Pepperoni, Artisan Cheese Blend

items.title: Forest Mushroom Impossible™ Sausage Pizza
items.description: Roasted Mushrooms, Plant-based Sausage, Mushroom Spread, Caramelized Onions, Green Onions, Fresh Mozzarella, Artisan Cheese Blend

items.title: Charcuterie Pizza
items.description: Premium Pepperoni, Prosciutto, Sausage, Arugula, Fire-roasted Tomatoes, Artisan Cheese Blend

items.title: Classic Sundae
items.description: Vanilla Ice Cream, Chocolate Sauce, Chantilly Cream, Toasted Almonds, topped with a Cherry

items.title: Apple Galette
items.description: Caramel Ice Cream, Vanilla Sauce, Powdered Sugar

items.title: Power Pack
items.description: A Cuties® Mandarin Orange, Yogurt Smoothie, Carrots, Whole-Grain “Fish” Crackers, with Choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions
